turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Kelly, I was hoping you might be able to order a drink for me from Peet's coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which store did you want me to order from ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The 1854 Westwood location, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok got it, and what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get an iced caramel latte please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, and what kind of milk did you want with that ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Soy please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and do you want foam ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No tell them no foam please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and what size did you want ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Regular

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I think they have medium

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, medium

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok got it, it should be ready in 10 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thanks so much

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh and whose name is it under ?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's under your name

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok thanks talk to you soon!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok bye!
